title: Design Alchemy Gothic T-shirt design
content:
Self-promotional T-shirt design for Design Alchemy.   
(Letter design below was not printed)   
Lettering is based on re-contructed Hybrid font original design by C. Küsters   
   
 ![Design Alchemy Gothic.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417061806im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/913.jpg)
